reviewText:
Even one star is too many. Bought this; it didn't work in our new DVD player. Ordered a replacement. It, too, doesn't work in our new DVD player. Nor does it work in a DVD player that is slightly older, or on any computer here.

Given the fact that it is copyrighted in 2000, we suspect that the product is simply too old to be marketed to people with contemporary equipment. Should this really be on the market?
